content: these mittens are knitted flat and designed for knitters who do not enjoy knitting in the round the striped mitts use 3 stitches knit purl and a make 1 increase designed by amanda berry @fluffandfuzz they are knitted in dk weight acrylic yarns double knitting/light worsted/8 ply and use less than a 50g skein in each of two yarn shades **needles** a pair of 3 75mm single pointed knitting needles us 5 **recommended yarn** sirdar hayfield bonus dk double knitting/light worsted weight 100% acrylic in dark grey mix and light grey mix shades **notions** tapestry needle and a stitch holder **sizes** one size only - adult small-medium **techniques** for confident beginners and above other techniques used include seaming increases and knitting stripes **pattern info** this knitting pattern is a pdf download 3 pages and written in english patterns for personal use only not for resale copyright © 2017 amanda berry all rights reserved
